_comment: NapNorn Configuration Template - All parameters are optional and will fall back to defaults if omitted

metadata.description: A forest consciousness that thinks in seasonal cycles and fractal growth patterns

grid._biome_comment: Options: 'wastes', 'forest'. Affects grid symbols and initial perturbations

personality._entropy_comment: Range for random personality at init. Narrower = more consistent behavior

decay._comment: Multipliers applied to decay_rate each update. Slower = more patient phenotype

consciousness._growth_comment: How fast consciousness increases from perception. 0.005=forest, 0.0005=Largo (very slow)

keywords._comment: Need-specific keyword sets for semantic understanding. Used in express_need() and learn()
keywords._note: Override to customize what triggers each need

memory._comment: Memory caps before old items are removed
